Package fs.fibu2.filter

Interface Summary
EntryFilter An EntryFilter is an object which can filter entries according to a certain criterion.
 

Class Summary
AbstractFilterPreferences This class provides static methods for inserting general filter preferences into a given Preferences node and for retrieving them.
AccountFilter Filters entries according to their account field
AccountInformationFilter Filters entries according to the information supplied for an account.
AdditionalInformationFilter Filters entries for their additional information field
CategoryFilter Filters entries according to their category
DateFilter Filters entries according to their date
DefaultFilters This class provides factory methods to create filters which are frequently used, such as Year filters
EntryFilterEditor An EntryFilterEditor provides a graphical interface for editing a filter.
FilterLoader This class supplies static methods to retrieve instances of EntryFilter objects using their ID.
FilterPool Several JournalModules use StackFilters for their views and sometimes it might be useful to copy an existing filter into another module without the need to recreate it from scratch.
NameFilter This filters entries on comparing their 'name' value to a certain filter.
StackFilter This class implements a stack of filters.
StandardFilterComponent This class implements the standard component, which is used by all standard fsfibu2 EntryFilters.
ValueFilter This filter filters entries according to their value field.
 

Enum Summary
StandardFilterComponent.Selection
